title: Changing Regions
body:
Hi,
so I somehow switched my account into the Oceania. It was originally made in the North America region but it won't let me log in with The North America region. I don't have enough RP to change it back. Is there a way that I can do it for free or an easier way? and is it even possible?
Thanks for any help given!

replies.body:
thats weird, hopefully riot helps you out.

but im afraid there isnt a free way to change servers, lucky for you there isn't that much lag here so.
well thats good. I got an email from a riot saying I have to spend rp to get back... oh well
